compliant.section: 我們於下列情形蒐集或取得您的個人資料：當您提供資訊給本公司時〈例如：當您主動聯繫我們〉；基於我們與您雙方間的法律關係而取得之資訊〈例如：當您向我們採購產品〉;
compliant.legal provisions: The collection of personal data must be based on the necessity and legality of the purpose.

compliant.section: 您自行公開之個人資料〈例如：您在社群媒體上公開之資訊〉;
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data that is publicly available can be collected under certain conditions.

compliant.section: 當您造訪本公司的網站；當您向本公司任何一個網站註冊以使用我們的網站、產品或服務;
compliant.legal provisions: The collection of personal data must be based on the necessity and legality of the purpose.

non_compliant.section: 當您和本公司網站上的第三方內容或廣告進行互動。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy should specify how third-party interactions are handled and whether consent is required.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the process of obtaining consent for data collection from third-party interactions.

non_compliant.section: 另外，我們也可能由第三方獲得您的個人資料〈例如：執法機關〉。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The policy should specify the conditions under which personal data can be obtained from third parties and ensure transparency.
non_compliant.amend: Provide details on the circumstances and legal basis for obtaining personal data from third parties.
